Articles.Content:
Here's my nuclear submarine, it has an interior, torpedoes and missles.

But enough talk, here's a album:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

To launch it you need to get it into the water, I use hyperedit, but anything would work.

Stage to activate the engines.

This submarine cannot dive, and is very slow, it's mostly a showpiece.

Good luck getting kerbals into it, they can walk in it when it's in the water.

The next stage will launch the torpedoes.

The rest of the stages launch missles in groups.

Enjoy!

Download

Edited June 27, 2015 by Mad Rocket Scientist

You really are a mad scientist ... not only do you get the tech right, you take screenshots with the right ambiance, as if we're really inside!

+rep!

I really wanna collaborate once 1.0 is released, who knows what we can show the world!

You really are a mad scientist ... not only do you get the tech right, you take screenshots with the right ambiance, as if we're really inside!

+rep!

I really wanna collaborate once 1.0 is released, who knows what we can show the world!

Thanks a lot!

I tried to build a boat with one of those amazing turboprops of yours, but the turboprop floated to much.

But wait...

If I mount the turbo above the water line...
So it really is a submarine looking boat? Nice, but we do have some of those already.

I saw this in the Work-In-Progress thread.. Looks amazing! (Kerbal Water Program, anyone?)

Repped! (Yes, again! )

PS: How does it get into water, other than HyperEdit?
